Title: Authorizes the impoundment of certain motor vehicles
Summary: Authorizes the impoundment of for sale motor vehicles parked on a public highway with an improper validating sticker or the absence of a proper validating sticker.
LawCode: Amd ยง401, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the impoundment of for sale motor vehicles parked on a public highway with an improper validating sticker or the absence of a proper validating sticker
